description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Ballarat, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Heritage Ballarat Apartments near City Centre with Lake Activities, Heated Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Strike gold with a retreat at Club Wyndham Ballarat, a heritage-listed mansion in the heart of Victoria's famous goldfields. Set within 55-acre grounds encompassing manicured gardens and a lake, this magnificent property is adorned with Victorian-era furnishings blending historic beauty and modern luxuries. Explore the area's vibrant dining scene and popular sites (including Sovereign Hill!) on one of the hotel's e-bikes and enjoy a friendly hit of tennis, finishing with a dip in the heated pool.

seo.title: Hôtels à Ballarat - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Ballarat, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
